segments.text: I think we should do the floors before we work on the curtains and walls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? it doesn't make sense . If we do the floors first , and then paint the walls , we will get paint all over our new floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm Maybe you're right . But I can't stand all this green carpet here . And besides , I know how to paint . I will just cover everything with drop cloth . I won't get anything on the floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm sure I've done a lot of house painting in my life . And my mother was very picky . If I got even a tiny drop of paint on her furniture , she would get furious . So I learned to be very careful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Then maybe we can do the floor first . These wood floors under this carpet are beautiful . And me too — — I can't wait to get all this old carpet out of here . But how can we get it out ? Do we have to hire someone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely not . We can remove the carpet ourselves . Carpet is held down with carpet nails . You just need to pull it hard and it will come up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Then , after we remove the carpet , we need to redo all the wood floors . Right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But we should hire someone for that . That will probably be expensive . And it has to be done right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And then , after the floors are done , we can start to move our furniture in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . If we can get an appointment with someone to do the floors , we should probably be able to have the furniture in here after a week or so . I can get all the carpet out this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
